headline: McDonald's Stock Before Q2 Earnings: Buy Now or Wait for Results?
summary: MCD's Q2 results are due on Aug. 6, with strong digital growth and menu innovation likely driving top-line gains.

headline: PureWager Group Appoints Technology Industry Veteran Wayne Kalish as Interim CFO
summary: Seasoned Financial Executive to Support Rapid Growth Amid Exclusive Gaming PartnershipsORLANDO, Fla., Aug. 04, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- PureWager Group, positioned to be the disruptive force behind gaming’s most exclusive partnerships, today announced the appointment of Wayne Kalish as Interim Chief Financial Officer. Kalish brings 30+ years of financial leadership across public and private companies, including senior roles at Tavistock Corporation, Darden Restaurants, and Ruby Tuesday. A senior
